Welcome

Explore our data to learn more about the UK's doctors and where they are practising.

We hold data about doctors from the moment they register with us, to the day they retire. You can use this resource to discover new insights and reveal emerging trends about doctors, where they have studied and trained in the UK and the routes they take throughout their careers.
As a proactive regulator, we're committed to sharing our data with stakeholders across the medical sector, to identify and reduce risk, and drive up standards. This site will play an important role in helping us share what we know with regulators and other organisations working to improve patient care.
